mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reservations (customer_id, flight_id, seat_number, seat_class, reservation_date, customer_name, customer_email) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{flightId}, #{seatNumber}, #{seatClass}, NOW(), #{customerName}, #{customerEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE Seats SET is_available = #{isAvailable} WHERE flight_id = #{flightId} AND seat_number = #{seatNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, CONCAT(f.departure_airport, '-', f.arrival_airport) AS flightName, f.departure_time, COUNT(r.reservation_id) AS reservationCount FROM reservations r JOIN flights f ON r.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE f.departure_time GROUP BY r.flight_id ORDER BY f.departure_time

SELECT r.*, CONCAT(f.departure_airport, '-', f.arrival_airport) AS flightName, f.departure_time, COUNT(r.reservation_id) AS reservationCount FROM reservations r JOIN flights f ON r.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE DATE(f.departure_time) = #{selectedDate} GROUP BY r.flight_id ORDER BY f.departure_time

SELECT r.*, CONCAT(f.departure_airport, '-', f.arrival_airport) AS flightName, f.departure_time FROM reservations r JOIN flights f ON r.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE f.departure_time = #{departureTime} AND CONCAT(f.departure_airport, '-', f.arrival_airport) = #{flightName} GROUP BY r.flight_id ORDER BY f.departure_time
